Title: Just learned that a FAT file system can only have ~2^16 files in it. I thought my 1 TB drive filled ...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: Just learned that a FAT file system can only have ~2^16 files in it. I thought my 1 TB drive filled up quickly. Luckily I can just make more folders. For some reason it filled up at 2^14. Maybe because my file names were so long?
